fields.description: Styles are done in tss files and typically tied to markup elements using class or id. Having support as a style attribute on the element would be. It should act as CSS style attribute when calculating style values.

comments.body: Your right Tony. I did not mean use style="{..}" in xml markup. I was thinking each style would be it's own attribute. I brought CSS for how to apply specificity.
